mapper.select: select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate from user where email = #{email} or userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into user(userid, email, password, nickname, phone, avatar, point, regdate) values(#{userid}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, #{point}, now())
mapper.select: select vus.userid, u.nickname, vus.questionid, q.content, vus.selectid, s.answer, vus.input_text, vus.regdate from view_user_survey vus, survey_q q, survey_s s, user u where vus.selectid = s.selectid and vus.questionid = q.questionid and vus.userid = u.userid and vus.userid = #{userid};
select * from view_user_survey where userid = #{userid} and questionid = #{questionid}
mapper.insert: insert into result(selectid, userid, questionid, input_text, regdate) values(#{selectid}, #{userid}, #{questionid}, #{input_text}, #{regdate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE})
